about_the_game:
"Hi guys, I am the dev for this game and I just published my very first game. I don't have any prior experience with game development but I tried my best to bring the game that hopefully suits everyone taste. This is still an early version and there are many plans for update. Please enjoy."

Set in a Fantasy World

The game is about the player being reincarnated into another world. The new world has monsters, humans etc. The goal of the game is to climb to the top of the dungeon tower in 100 days. Manage your time, level up, train your stats or work to earn extra money. Will you finally be the one to climb to the top and claim the title of the strongest?

All About Cards

The entire system is based on Cards. Meaning that the stronger the cards you have, the better the chance for your survival. There are more than 20 Attack Cards and many more will be updated in the future version.

Rival System

There is a rival for you to compete against in the game. The rival will also be climbing the tower on his own and try to reach the top. There is also a chance that you two might encounter each other on some floor and have to fight.

Dojo

Do you get tired of getting defeated and don't want to level up? You can go train in the dojo.
But beware there are mini-games for each of the stats.

Boss

There are multiple bosses stopping you from reaching you to the top.  Each with their own Territory.

Day/Night System

The world is constantly advancing based on your actions. If the player decides to keep climbing the tower during night time, there will be bigger challenges for him/her but the rewards will be better. Do you still dare to climb the tower then?

Defeated!! Not a Problem

Being defeated is not a thing to be afraid in the game. Once you have defeated, you will start from the beginning of the dungeon floor again.

name: King of Cards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7 or later(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Set into the magical world of cards and monsters where you try to be the strongest of all and become a king. Manage your time, Buy Cards, build your stats, Beat your rival and climb to the top of the dungeon tower. Will you be the one to climb to the top and claim the title of the strongest?
